Package com.pgs.service

Class UsuarioServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.pgs.service.UsuarioServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUsuarioService
@Service public class UsuarioServiceImpl extends Object implements IUsuarioService
Implementation of the service for managing users (usuarios). Provides methods to list, save, find, and delete users, as well as find users by email and active status.
Author:
Pablo Garcia Simavilla

    • buscarPorCorreoActivo

      public UsuarioModel buscarPorCorreoActivo(String correo)
      Finds a user by its email address and active status. Only returns the user if the status is active.
      Specified by:
      buscarPorCorreoActivo in interface IUsuarioService
      Parameters:
      correo - the email address of the user to find.
      Returns:
